articles.title: Delta Covid variant now dominant strain worldwide, deaths surge in US among unvaccinated people: Officials - India Today
articles.description: The Delta Covid variant has been detected in 100 countries globally. Cases of Covid-19 have surged by 70% over the previous week and deaths by 26% in the US, especially among the unvaccinated people.
